text: Cheer Up and Smile is a 1930 American musical movie directed by Sidney Lanfield and stars Arthur Lake, Dixie Lee, Olga Baclanova, Johnny Arthur, John Darrow, John Wayne. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lanfield
title: Cheer Up and Smile
